Excellent Great place!

Good Great value for an overnight stay. Pleasant and friendly staff. Parking is a bit of a problem as its an underground ramp. The room had no hot water but the staff accommodated us by allowing us to use another rooms shower. Very noisy at night, lots of dog barking. Rooms were new spacious clean and new comfortable beds. Good value for the money.

direccion: Av. Lizardo Ruiz y Eloy Alfaro, Ambato, Tungurahua, 180101

comentarios.comentario: Excellent

Excellent The hotel is beautiful, a new property but nevertheless with a great history in the vecinity with the old Ambato cotton fabric. Quiet stay and very comfortable bed. The service given by the staff was superb from entry until check out. A place with a fantastic view of the mountains of Ambato and very nice resting spot for the night. Good pressure in the shower for a relaxing time. Recommended.
Excellent Muy bueno el baño limpio

direccion: Comunidad Manzana Pamba Chico, Salasaca, Tungurahua, 180758

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Si te gusta la naturaleza y conocer culturas y trdiciones, este es el lugar ideal. Alonzo es un anfitrion espectacular y sus historias son increibles!

direccion: Panamerica Sur km 12, Ambato, Tizaleo, Tungurahua, 180205

comentarios.comentario: Excellent

direccion: Juan Leon Mera y los Misioneros, Baños de Agua Santa

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Foi o melhor lugar que nos hospedamos em toda a viagem ao Equador. Sebastian e Maria são extremamente gentis e hospitaleiros. A casa é linda, muito limpa.Os hospédes não entram com seus calçados, o que favorece ainda mais a limpeza e tem um aroma de eucalipto muito agradável. O quarto é bom, muito espaçoso. Bem localizado, muito perto do Centro, mas em uma área ao mesmo tempo bem tranquila. Voltaria a me hospedar novamente, sem a menor sombra de dúvidas e super indico.

direccion: Calle Ambato y Pastaza, Baños de Agua Santa, Tungurahua, 180250

comentarios.comentario: Excellent This friendly, funky, family-run guesthouse offers tremendous value for your money. Conveniently located, generally quiet. I enjoyed hanging out in the deck too.

Excellent From the outside, you might think you made a mistake!  But then you go to the entrance and you see a beautiful eco-hotel.  Saul is an amazing host!  He served ya a delicious breakfast in the morning and then was our tour guide for the day.  He also helped ya fix our tire that someone had let the air out of.   The room we stayed in was spacious and comfortable and “rustic” in a good way.  I highly recommend this place to stay...and suggest you spend more than a day in Baños.

Excellent Hotel is owned by a local family who were all really nice and friendly. Darwin’s dog Pichuca was also really cute! Rooms were big and shower temperature and pressure was good. Breakfast was simple but good and really fresh.

Terrible No privacy in room (window can't be completely blocked with curtain, people walking by, and zero sound proofing, no working wifi.  Never tried hot water, left asap in morning.  But owners were very nice and tried to apologize and accomodate. 1 or 2 extra rooms were under construction(almost done) so could be better in future.
Terrible

Excellent Petit hôtel très mignon, géré par un proprio très attentionné et sympathique qui a vécu de nombreuses années en Suisse avant de revenir en Equateur.
On est baigné dans une atmosphère très familiale, et on a le privilège d'être légèrement décalés de la rue, ce qui limite les nuisances sonores. 
Rencontres avec les autres voyageurs  facilitées grâce à la cuisine commune très pratique, toit terrasse très agréable également.
Petit déjeuner pas mal du tout, avec du très très bon pain !
A noter :
- les chambres paraissent inégales, ne pas hésiter à les visiter pour choisir. 
- pour les excursions, il est préférable de les réserver directement dans les agences afin d'éviter la commission de l'hôtel.See more
Excellent

Excellent Excelente ubicación y atención de Saúl. Muy familiar, buena señal de wifi y tv. Dejamos la sugerencia para modificar mobiliario ya que el espacio disponible es reducido. Buen asesoramiento para actividades a realizar. Imperdible el tour a la selva con Saúl y Germán como guías.
Excellent Excelente la atención y la amabilidad de sus dueños, el desayuno muy fresco y natural, el lugar es bien agradable, regresaría de nuevo :)
Excellent

comentarios.comentario: Okay I don't want to be a bad guy, but I got there and no one was there to greet me.  Possibly there was some kind of confusion or who knows.   But I chose not to stay at their place. and I wish them the best.

comentarios.nombreh_id: La Casa del Molino Blanco B&B
comentarios.comentario: Good Require fifteen minutes walking uphill to reach it. Nice layout of room and patio. Only concern too dark while staying in room, not able to read during the night.

comentarios.nombreh_id: La Casa del Molino Blanco B&B
comentarios.comentario: Okay Out of the centre of town but closer to one of the thermal baths, bed was comfortable and shower was good, WiFi was good as long as the hostel isn't full. Good idea of energy saving at the hostel. Nice set up for movies. When the hostel is full it can be very noisy, breakfast was nice but economical.

comentarios.nombreh_id: La Casa del Molino Blanco B&B
comentarios.comentario: Excellent

comentarios.nombreh_id: La Casa del Molino Blanco B&B
comentarios.comentario:
Excellent I don’t know how anyone could rate this place less than excellent...especially considering the awesome staff. Whomever gave negative reviews must be very difficult guests because the staff far exceeded my expectations.

*Clean, economical rooms
*Beer, bottled drinks, wine, even massages in house that you can purchase onsite
*the most helpful staff ever...booked tours for us for way cheaper than we could find on our own, English speaking, and consistently went above and beyond. Helped us avoid missing our flight by explaining the am bus schedule and that we wouldn’t make it to Quito in time. Then she booked a taxi for us (our only option as we had to leave at 3am) and GOT UP AT 3 AM to escort us to the taxi!
*very delicious breakfast that changes everyday. You even have the option to add to it for additional cost. Great, friendly cook.
*Cheap laundry service!

Say here, you won’t regret it. See more

comentarios.nombreh_id: La Casa del Molino Blanco B&B
comentarios.comentario: Excellent Great space, friendly staff and and helpful staff. Location out of the way but facilities make up for it.

comentarios.nombreh_id: La Casa del Molino Blanco B&B
comentarios.comentario:
Good Great breakfast, good, clean, spacious bathroom and quiet location. It’s up the hill away from the bustle & noise of the centre of Baños but everything is a 5 minute walk. 
Met lovely people here.
